DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Recursos do Departamento e Divis?o escolhidos, Atividades do Per?odo selecionado","WidgetType":"resourcescheduler","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":2,"WidgetRows":20,"WidgetColumns":39,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Forecast","metricFieldValue":"TimeGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Actual","metricFieldValue":"UtilizationPercentGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":false,"showTitle":false},"WidgetDataSources":{"resources":{"value":"SELECT 
	ssu.Oid as UserId, 
	ssu.UserName,
	ut.[Name] as UserTypology,
	u.HasImage as HasImage
FROM 
	SecuritySystemUser ssu, 
	[User] u
	LEFT OUTER JOIN UserTypology ut ON (ut.Oid = u.Typology)
WHERE 
	ssu.Oid = u.Oid AND
	ssu.GCRecord is null AND
	ssu.IsActive = 1 AND
    ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in (@UserOid) or u.Oid in (@UserOid)) AND
    ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in (@UserTypeOid) or ut.Oid in (@UserTypeOid))





     
 
","type":"querytext","mapping":{"id":"UserId","name":"UserName","typology":"UserTypology","hasImage":"HasImage"}},"assignments":{"value":"select d.[Oid] AS JobId, 
d.[Number] AS JobNumber, 
e.[Subject] AS JobName, 
p.[Name] as ProjectName, 
d.[EntryDateUtc] AS JobStartDate, 
d.[AgreedDateUtc] AS JobEndDate, 
datediff(day, d.EntryDateUtc, d.AgreedDateUtc) as Duration, 
isnull(w.Color, wst.Color) as Color, 
a.Oid AS AssignmentId, 
a.[User] AS UserId, 
a.[Workload], 
cc.[Name] as ClientName, 
cc.Oid as ClientId, 
cc.HasImage 
from deliverable d, Project p, CommercialClient cc, [Event] e, WorkflowState w, WorkflowStateType wst, Assignment a, AssignmentType at, [User] usr, Department dep, UserTypology ut 
where d.IsDraft = 0 and d.Plannable = 1 and p.Oid = d.Project and cc.Oid = d.Client and d.Oid = e.Oid 
and d.WorkflowState = w.Oid and wst.oid = w.WorkflowStateType and d.Oid = a.DocumentOid 
and a.AssignmentType = at.Oid and a.[User] = usr.Oid 
and usr.Department = dep.Oid 
and e.GCRecord is null 
and ut.Oid = usr.Typology 
and at.[Name] = 'Executor' 
and 
(   
    (d.[EntryDateUtc] between @FromDate and @ToDate) OR
    (d.[AgreedDateUtc] between @FromDate and @ToDate) OR
    (d.[EntryDateUtc] < @FromDate and d.[AgreedDateUtc] > @ToDate)
)
and ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in (@ClientOid) or D.Client in (@ClientOid))","type":"querytext","mapping":{"id":"AssignmentId","startDateUtc":"JobStartDate","endDateUtc":"JobEndDate","name":"JobName","eventId":"JobId","resourceId":"UserId","eventColor":"Color","workload":"Workload","clientId":"ClientId","clientName":"ClientName","projectName":"ProjectName","hasImage":"HasImage"}},"holidays":{"value":"select hol.Oid, hol.Name, hol.Date from holiday hol, division div where hol.Company = div.Company","type":"querytext","mapping":{"id":"Oid","name":"Name","startDate":"Date"}},"leaves":{"value":"select ssu.Oid as UserId, usv.Day as Date, uvt.Name as LeaveType, usv.Oid as LeaveId from SecuritySystemUser ssu, Department dep, [User] u, UserTypology ut, UserVacation usv, UserVacationType uvt, UserInfoVacation uiv where ssu.Oid = u.Oid and ssu.GCRecord is null and ssu.IsActive = 1 and u.Plannable = 1 and u.SystemAdministrator = 0 and ut.Oid = u.Typology and dep.Oid = u.Department and (exists ( select 1 from [User] u2 cross apply openjson (u.TagsJson) with (Label nvarchar(200) '$.Label') where u2.Oid = u.Oid and u2.TagsJson is not null and u2.TagsJson <> '' and isjson(u2.TagsJson) > 0)) and usv.[User] = u.Oid and uiv.Oid = usv.UserInfoVacation and uvt.Oid = uiv.UserVacationType ","type":"querytext","mapping":{"id":"LeaveId","startDate":"Date","name":"LeaveType","resourceId":"UserId"}},"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate","UserOid","ClientOid","UserTypeOid"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Por Alocar
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Atividades do Per?odo","WidgetType":"gridbryntum","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":39,"WidgetYPosition":2,"WidgetRows":20,"WidgetColumns":9,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"startDate":"2019-01-01","endDate":"2019-12-31","type":"year","visible":false},"showSubTitle":false,"showTitle":false},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select  ws.Name,
        job.Oid as JobId,
        job.NameAndExternalId as Job,
        datediff(day, job.EntryDateUtc, job.AgreedDateUtc) as Duration,
        'd' as DurationUnit,
        job.EntryDateUtc as StartDate,
        job.AgreedDateUtc as EndDate,
        isnull(ws.Color, wst.Color) as EventColor,
        job.Client as ClientId,
        cc.Name as ClientName,
        prj.Name as ProjectName,
        cc.HasImage,
        cc.Name as ClientName
from    Deliverable job, WorkflowState ws, WorkflowStateType wst, Project prj, Department dep, CommercialClient cc
where   job.WorkflowState = ws.Oid and 
        wst.Oid = ws.WorkflowStateType and
        prj.Oid = job.Project and
        job.IsDraft = 0 and
        job.Plannable = 1 and
        cc.Oid = job.Client and
        not exists (
            select  1
            from    Assignment asn, AssignmentType ast
            where   asn.DocumentOid = job.Oid and
                    ast.Oid = asn.AssignmentType and
                    ast.[Name] = 'Executor'
        ) and
        dep.Oid = job.Department and
        ws.Name not in('Canceled', 'Complete')","mapping":{"id":"JobId","name":"Job","startDate":"StartDate","endDate":"EndDate","workload":"Duration","eventColor":"EventColor","clientId":"ClientId","clientName":"clientName","hasImage":"HasImage"}}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":[]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Filtro de valores
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Escolha para Alocar","WidgetType":"tag","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#ffffff","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":2,"WidgetColumns":9,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"showSubTitle":false,"showTitle":false},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select  'Resource' as GroupName, 
        'UserOid' as GroupId, 
        u.Name, 
        u.Oid 
from    SecuritySystemUser ssu, Department dep, [User] u, UserTypology ut
where   ssu.Oid = u.Oid and
        ssu.GCRecord is null and
        ssu.IsActive = 1 and
        u.SystemAdministrator = 0 and
        ut.Oid = u.Typology and
        dep.Oid = u.Department
union all
select  'User Type' as GroupName, 
        'UserTypeOid' as GroupId, 
        dep.Name + ' - ' + ut.Name as UserType, 
        ut.Oid 
from    SecuritySystemUser ssu, Department dep, [User] u, UserTypology ut
where   ssu.Oid = u.Oid and
        ssu.GCRecord is null and
        ssu.IsActive = 1 and
        u.SystemAdministrator = 0 and
        ut.Oid = u.Typology and
        dep.Oid = u.Department
group by dep.Name + ' - ' + ut.Name, ut.Oid

union all
select  distinct 
        'Client' as GroupName, 
        'ClientOid' as GroupId, 
        cc.Name, 
        cc.Oid 
from    deliverable d, Deliverable_UserFields duf, 
        Project p, CommercialClient cc, [Event] e, 
        WorkflowState w, WorkflowStateType wst, Assignment a, 
        AssignmentType at, [User] usr, Department dep, UserTypology ut 
where   d.IsDraft = 0 and
        p.Oid = d.Project and
        cc.Oid = d.Client and
        d.Oid = e.Oid and
        d.WorkflowState = w.Oid and
        wst.oid = w.WorkflowStateType and
        d.Oid = a.DocumentOid and
        a.AssignmentType = at.Oid and
        a.[User] = usr.Oid and
        usr.Department = dep.Oid and
        e.GCRecord is null and
        ut.Oid = usr.Typology and
        at.[Name] = 'Executor' and
        duf.Oid = d.Oid","mapping":{"groupExpr":"GroupName","groupId":"GroupId","displayExpr":"Name","valueExpr":"Oid"}}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Selector de datas
